itunes:title: Game Scoop! 696: So Many Horror Games
itunes:author: Samuel Claiborn, Matt Kim, Justin Davis, Colin Stevens
itunes:summary: Welcome back to IGN Game Scoop!, the ONLY video game podcast ever created! You'd think others would have caught on by now but nope! This week your Omega Cops -- Samuel Claiborn (filling in for Daemon), Justin Davis,  Matt Kim, and Colin Stevens -- are discussing ALL THE HORROR: Silent Hills! Residents Evil! Dead Space! We've actually played some of these games. Also get the verdict on Gotham Knights... And, of course, Video Game 20 Questions. A real humdinger!
itunes:subtitle: Welcome back to IGN Game Scoop!, the ONLY video game podcast ever created! You'd think others would have caught on by now but nope! itunes:keywords: silent hill movie sequel, silent hill, return to silent hill, silent hill f, silent hill ascension, marvel snap, silent hill 5, dead space remake, game scoop, gotham knights, re4, resident evil 4 remake, resident evil 4, silent hill 2 remake, ign, re4 remake
